name: The Honey Badger
description:
The Honey Badger's temperament often leads it into problematic situations. Can you survive a day as one?

This is an FPS where you are the weapon.

Any & all feedback is welcome in the comments.

Controls

  • WASD / Arrows to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Click once to bite
  • Click and hold to grab thing with your mouth
  • Release click to throw
  • Space to jump

Credits

  • Thanks a heap to Max for play testing
  • Design & code by me
  • Models by polyperfect
  • Sound effects from Zapsplat
